author: andschwa
body: Then enable the code that is commented out in the console host, because the ReadKey method was not available  The CoreCLR team appears to be working on bring back this feature, which would unblock us   https   github.com dotnet corefx issues 1153 https   github.com dotnet corefx issues 311  VSO create date - 8/4/2015 8:32:00     VSO closed date - 12/17/2015 11:39:00
title: Read arbitrary keys, including non-printable keys like cursor and ESC
